      • drawShape

        public static void drawShape​(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext ctx,
                             Coordinate inputPos,
                             Coordinate outputPos,
                             java.util.List<Line> lines,
                             float default_length,
                             boolean selected)
        Draw shape of a component. Called by components. HUN: Komponens alakzatának kirajzolása. A komponensek hívják.
        Parameters:
        ctx - GraphicsContext
        inputPos - Position of the input node of the component.
        outputPos - Position of the output node of the component.
        lines - List of lines describing the shape of the component.
        default_length - The default / normal length of the component. Used to calculate scaling of the drawing.
        selected - Whether the component is selected or not.
